metadata.Title: CVE-2021-33618 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: Dolibarr ERP and CRM 13.0.2 allows XSS via object details, as demonstrated by > and < characters in the onpointermove attribute of a BODY element to the user-management feature.

criterions.comment: dolibarr: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
